title: So malzahar is getting dumpstered
body:
These changes look absolutely awful

Malzahar

    Void Swarm (W) -
        Mana cost lowered to 40 from 80
        Now works on a recharge system instead of just a 20-16 second cooldown.

            [old] 20/19/18/17/16 second cooldown.
            [new]20/19/18/17/16 recharge time & max of two stacks.

        Voidling spawn on attack changed:

            [old] "first time a voidling attacks a champion or monster, or assists in a killing a unit, Malzahar spawns a new Voidling with the same remaining duration." & "will not spawn from a voidling with less than 4 seconds left"

            [new] "If a Voidling has more than 9 seconds remaining, its first attack against a champion or monster will spawn a new Voidling with the same remaining duration,"

        Voidlings now have 3 "HP" - similar to wards.

        Voidling Physical Damage changed to base + bAD from % of total AD.

            [old]  30/32.5/35/37.5/40% of total AD

            [new] 30/35/40/45/50 +  40% of bonus AD

        Voidling damage AP ratio increased to 20% from 10%

        Voidling detail changes:

            [added]  "Deals 300% damage to lane minions effected by Malefic Visions (E) "

            [added] "If target is afflicted by Nether Grasp (R) or Malefic Visions (E) and Malzahar is near by, has 100% increased attack speed.

            [removed] "Prefers to attack targets with Nether Grasp (R) or Malefic Visions (E)"

            [removed] "When 3 or ore voidlings are active, they all gain 50% attack speed"

            [removed] "Deals 300% damage to lane minions below 20% health"

No more AD malzahar

Tnx Riot you suck

The problem is that a lot of it relies on base skill damage, which AP builds also benefit from.

A Malz with Needlessly Large Rod will get 30 + 12 = 42 from new changes, which is quite close to the AD numbers, WHILE getting an incredible boost to all his other skills. Before, he would get what? 20 AD (66 base AD * 0.3) + 6 (10% ratio) AP = 26? (I'm excluding the 10 bonus magic damage from all my calculations, and only focusing on what has changed: base AD damage, ad ratios and ap ratios).

So it's somewhat irrelevant if new voidlings will get _slightly_ more damage for AD builds, when they will get _significantly_ more damage for AP builds.

P.S. You should put that tooltip somewhere else, because it's one of most important mechanics that any new Malz player needs to learn.

jeez, you gave me a flipping panic attack i thought he would be useless for a second there.
Just because AD Malzahar is dead, he's getting dumpstered???? Dude... This was a waste of my time.
That's a buff to the survivability of his voidlings.  I can't instantly delete them anymore.
ok so he's dumpstered, his whole kit is, because he can't build AD anymore.

you missed the biggest problem though

he can't control his voidlings anymore
AD malz died when voidlings couldn't touch turrets, hopefully turrets only do 1 damage to voidling since they have 3 hp.
don't be so picky and whiny about such minuscule changes.

While I agree being picky and whiny is annoying and unproductive, unless coupled with proactivity and activism, I disagree that the change was miniscule. It has butchered the identity of Malz as a lane bully, and an objective controller.

As a Malz main, this is going to make up for a lot of what was lacking in his minions, and I approve. This is going to bring back some things I loved about Malz, concerning split pushing, and taking towers. He's maintaining his image that Rito likes with AP, and a damage over time killer to any champ tank or adc. In case Rito is reading this, I just wanna say that I fell in love with Malz cuz of his assassin feel, so any more buffs to his AP so I can have this feel back would be greatly appreciated. #KeepBuffingApMalz
